quotes.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale
